objects.name: Analytic 1196
objects.description: Abuse of bind mounts to obscure process directories. Defender perspective: detecting anomalous mount operations where a process’s /proc entry is remapped to another directory, often hiding malicious activity from native utilities (ps, top). Behavior chain includes: (1) execution of `mount` with `-o bind` or `-B` flags, (2) modification of /proc entries inconsistent with expected process lineage, and (3) subsequent anomalous activity from processes whose metadata no longer matches execution context.
